metadata.Title: CVE-2019-13465 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in the ROS communications-related packages (akaros_comm or ros-melodic-ros-comm) through 1.14.3. ROS_ASSERT_MSG only workswhen ROS_ASSERT_ENABLED is defined. This leads to a problem in the remove()function in clients/roscpp/src/libros/spinner.cpp. When ROS_ASSERT_ENABLEDis not defined, the iterator loop will run out of the scope of the array,and cause denial of service for other components (that depend on thecommunication-related functions of this package). NOTE: The reporter ofthis issue now believes it was a false alarm.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-13465` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

cl-roscpp-msg - 1.14.3+ds1-11
cl-topic-tools - 1.14.3+ds1-11
libmessage-filters1d - 1.14.3+ds1-11
librosbag-storage4d - 1.14.3+ds1-11
librosbag4d - 1.14.3+ds1-11
libroscpp4d - 1.14.3+ds1-11
libroslz4-1d - 1.14.3+ds1-11
libtopic-tools2d - 1.14.3+ds1-11
libxmlrpcpp3d - 1.14.3+ds1-11
python3-message-filters - 1.14.3+ds1-11
python3-rosbag - 1.14.3+ds1-11
python3-roscpp-msg - 1.14.3+ds1-11
python3-rosgraph - 1.14.3+ds1-11
python3-roslaunch - 1.14.3+ds1-11
python3-roslz4 - 1.14.3+ds1-11
python3-rosmaster - 1.14.3+ds1-11
python3-rosmsg - 1.14.3+ds1-11
python3-rosnode - 1.14.3+ds1-11
python3-rosparam - 1.14.3+ds1-11
python3-rospy - 1.14.3+ds1-11
python3-rosservice - 1.14.3+ds1-11
python3-rostest - 1.14.3+ds1-11
python3-rostopic - 1.14.3+ds1-11
python3-roswtf - 1.14.3+ds1-11
python3-topic-tools - 1.14.3+ds1-11
ros-roscpp-msg - 1.14.3+ds1-11
ros-topic-tools-srvs - 1.14.3+ds1-11
rosout - 1.14.3+ds1-11
topic-tools - 1.14.3+ds1-11
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ros-ros-comm package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.14.3+ds1-11').
